meta.description: Insights about the SELF system itself
examples: Architect mind is most effective for you
Morning interactions have higher success rate

generated_insights.title: Structure Without Substrate
generated_insights.description: SELF has comprehensive infrastructure (memory graph, pattern recognition, evolution engine) but lacks accumulated experience data. The system design is complete but dormant - activation requires seeding initial data and enabling connections between components.

actionability.suggested_action: Bootstrap memory with meaningful initial data from significant interactions
actionability.outcome_if_acted: Memory now has first episode and entities populated

generated_insights.title: Evolution Targets Prompts But Minds Are Static
generated_insights.description: The evolution engine evolves prompt variants through genetic algorithms, but the five cognitive minds (Architect, Oracle, Critic, Creator, Guardian) are defined in static markdown files. Deeper evolution would allow mind definitions themselves to evolve based on user interaction patterns.

actionability.suggested_action: Consider adding mind-level evolution in future iterations - allow signal weights and mind behaviors to adapt

generated_insights.title: MCP Bridge Enables Persistent Memory
generated_insights.description: The Notion MCP integration is the key bridge for cross-session memory persistence. Local memory.json provides fast access, while Notion provides durability and semantic search. Surprise-driven sync prioritizes valuable learnings over routine interactions.

actionability.suggested_action: Keep MCP sync active and monitor sync success rates
actionability.outcome_if_acted: Notion MCP configured and SELF Knowledge Base created

generated_insights.title: Transcendence Commands Were Disconnected
generated_insights.description: The /agi, /genius, /think commands referenced in the AGI-PROMPT-BIBLE had no actual handlers - they were documented but not wired to functionality. A transcendence router was needed to connect command syntax to prompt templates and mind blend overrides.

actionability.suggested_action: Create transcendence-router.md to handle command dispatch
actionability.outcome_if_acted: Router created with command templates and blend overrides

insight_templates.preference_discovered: You seem to prefer {preference}. Would you like me to default to this?
insight_templates.prediction_offering: Based on your pattern, you might need {prediction} soon. Want me to prepare?
